5#ifndef GRAPH_VERTEX_HPP
6#define GRAPH_VERTEX_HPP
7
8#include <limits>
9#include <list>
10
11#include "Edge.hpp"
12
13#define INF std::numeric_limits<double>::max()
14
15class Vertex {
16 friend class Graph;
17 friend class DGraph;
18 friend class UGraph;
19
20/* ATTRIBUTES */
21protected:
22 int index;
23 double dist;
24 std::list<Edge*> out;
25 std::list<Edge*> in;
26
27public:
28 bool valid;
29
30/* CONSTRUCTOR */
31protected:
32 Vertex(const Vertex& v) = default;
33
34public:
35 explicit Vertex(bool valid = true)
36 : valid(valid), index(0), dist(INF) {}
37
38/* DESTRUCTOR */
39public:
40 virtual ~Vertex() = default;
41
42/* METHODS */
43public:
48 virtual Vertex* clone() const{
49 return new Vertex(*this);
50 }
51
56 int inDegree() const{
57 return (int) in.size();
58 }
59
64 int outDegree() const{
65 return (int) out.size();
66 }
67
72 std::list<Edge*> inEdges() const{
73 return in;
74 }
75
80 std::list<Edge*> outEdges() const{
81 return out;
82 }
83
84 bool operator<(const Vertex& rhs) const{
85 if (dist == rhs.dist)
86 return index < rhs.index;
87
88 return dist < rhs.dist;
89 }
90
91 bool operator>(const Vertex& rhs) const{
92 if (dist == rhs.dist)
93 return index > rhs.index;
94
95 return dist > rhs.dist;
96 }
97};
